scripts.bindgen:typescript: itk-wasm -b emscripten-build bindgen --package-name @itk-wasm/compare-images --package-description "Compare images with a tolerance for regression testing." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/itk-wasm'
scripts.bindgen:python: itk-wasm -b wasi-build bindgen --package-version 4.0.0 --interface python --package-name itkwasm-compare-images --package-description "Compare images with a tolerance for regression testing." --repository 'https://github.com/InsightSoftwareConsortium/itk-wasm'
scripts.build:python: pnpm build:wasi && pnpm bindgen:python && pnpm setup-micromamba && pnpm build:python:wasi
scripts.setup-micromamba: MICROMAMBA_ROOT_PATH=micromamba CREATE_ENVIRONMENT=true ENVIRONMENT_FILE=environment.yml GENERATE_RUN_SHELL=true MICROMAMBA_RUN_SHELL_PATH=./micromamba/run-shell LOG_LEVEL=info setup-micromamba
